value.name: Family of Donnie Sanders has demands for prosecutor, KCPD after officer not charged

value.name: Family of Kansas City man killed by police mourning death of another family member
value.description: The family of Donnie Sanders, still reeling with the loss of the 47-year-old shot and killed by a KCPD officer in March, now dealing with another tragedy.

value.description: They were all gathered to support Asian Americans. They gathered in defiance as hate against those communities hit a fatal crescendo. Reed turned to a Black woman standing next to her and thanked her for coming.
